# Tidytuesdays With R
The following is a list of some of the TidyTuesday projects I have completed. I started by attending some of the TidyTuesday sessions led by Professor [Jo Hardin](https://hardin47.netlify.app) and collaborating with other peers. We worked together to learn more about the Tidyverse. I don’t publish my TidyTuesday `.qmd` files every week because I don’t always have time, but I will try my best to share them when I can.

Here is the [**official TidyTuesday repo**](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday)
